entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 26.

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
